website_summaries.verdict: In spite of its peculiar smell, A+D Ointment has been on the market for years b/c it works well and is a cost-effective product.
pros: Works by forming a moisture barrier
Contains vitamins A and D. Jar contents go a long way
cons: The strong smell that may be off-putting for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Great For Prevention Of Bedsores and Dry, Cracked Skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. It was recommended to me originally for use in prevention of bedsores for a family member who was bedridden. It worked well, and I was so impressed that I now use it under a pair of white cotton gloves at night (found a great deal on gloves here on Amazon) to soften and heal my dry and sometimes cracked skin on my hands. It usually works wonders overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best Lotion for Babies.
customer_reviews.text: Love A&D! I was introduced to this product in the hospital, after having my first child, over 10 years agoA&D can be used in place of petroleum jelly, on cuts and bruises, for chapped lips and dry skin. It is great for babies bottoms and private parts. I prefer this to Desitin or other zinc based lotions. I used on all four of my children, my husband, myself and elderly parents. We always have several tubs in the house. And the price can’t be beat! It is double at the drugstore or almoatanywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is like magic.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. I used it on my first daughter, who had sensitive skin, and I was sold on it. I have a baby in the nicu and when she got a rash, they called up a balm from the pharmacy that was EXACTLY like this stuff. I love this stuff so much better than desitin of any of the other products. It cleans off so much easier, and I've even used it on irritated, itchy skin for myself and it works INSTANTLY. There's a reason I decided to be crazy and but this in a POUND jar. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: tattoofox

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a real good product. It's not something you would use on deeper cuts or puncture wounds (I use polysporin for that type of injury). I use this ointment primarily to sooth and heal a variety of scrapes and rashes that show up occasionally on the extremities. (Recently I used this product to heal a sore on my toe breaking in a new pair of shoes). In addition to the A+D, I also keep a tub of zinc oxide handy. Combining the two products works well healing the more persistent irritations. This is an effective ointment that has a pleasant, clean fresh scent. I will definitely purchase this product again. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong, but works!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this after having my daughter use aquaphor. Her diaper rash completely disappeared with this stuff and done desitin Max strength. Make a strong paste with those two overnight and you won’t see any more diaper rash in the morning. I’m not a fan of the smell but it works and is cheaper than other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Mets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I've been going to a flotation spa where you float/soak in epsom salt. The salt was wreaking havoc with tender membranes and little cuts and the petroleum jelly the spa was providing was simply not effective in creating a barrier, so I purchased this to take my own. Works perfectly - I don't feel any sting whatsoever from the salt in tender areas.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my crocodile like winter skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product contains lanolin. I've noticed that ingredient really soothes my chapped sticks so when I saw my mom bought this for my nephew and tried some of hers I quickly fell in love. It does feel like petroleum jelly, hence it's the higher ingredient in the list. My skin got so dry this winter I got painful cracks in my hands that burned badly. This was they only thing that help my flaky dry hands. My hands are now so smooth and I love to apply this all over after showering at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lissete ramos

customer_reviews.title: Best Ointment on the Market!!!
customer_reviews.text: You get a ton of product here and it’s good stuff. It surely keeps the little ones from getting a diaper rash. The consistency is thick and a little goes a long ways. The price is excellent comparable to buying the tubes at the drugstore. This will last you a long time. I would say buy this from Amazon and leave the little tubes at the drugstore. You won’t likely need to replace it during your infants first year. It should be something that every parent keeps in their home as it can also be used to treat scrapes, burns, eczema, psoriasis and other irritants of the skin. Excellent but for the product and price delivered to your door.
customer_reviews.author: Darnella Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great as usual, but
customer_reviews.text: The product smells like it's supposed to, came quickly, looks exactly how it should -bit melted cuz of the heat, but no one can control the weather, especially in SoCal lol- and I'm pretty sure it works just as good as usual. However, with this whole pandemic thing going down, you would think Amazon would finally put protective seals on this product before shipping them out, especially since this is mainly used for babies. :/ While there's no lambkin for me yet--I just got a tattoo--I'm lowkey scared to use it now. Can I get a new one with a seal, please?
customer_reviews.author: Ricka

customer_reviews.title: Strong Smell, Not a big Fan
customer_reviews.text: first, we are wondering to use this because it comes in an unwarped bottle. But after seeing review here we start using. We don't have long experience with this cream but we don't like the smell. They need to work to minimize smell. Otherwise, we just switched from another brand to this one. We hope this helps us to minimize my son's diaper rash. I will post an update here after some use if I feel something should share wih the shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva Hari

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, but it’s the worlds best lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: I have an addiction to this stuff despite the fact that it stinks like crazy. This is my go to night lip balm and ointment for dry cracking skin. Honestly, the smell is pretty bad especially if used on your lips and face but I’ve started to go nose blind to it and it doesn’t really taste like anything if you get it in your mouth. I wake up and this stuff is still on my lips in the morning. It’s gloopy but it works! It really needs a protection seal though. I think when I purchased it before from the store it had the sanitary seal. Probably won’t buy from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Probably Brandon’s wife who commandeered his account

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that works better than others we've tried
customer_reviews.text: We've used a number of products for diaper rash and redness, but this one has always worked the best for our little ones. Any redness from prolonged wet/dirty diaper wear usually clears up within a day when we use this after every change. Our youngest (redhead with porcelain skin) has more sensitive skin than her older (easily-tanned) sibling and this works great for her. Don't get me wrong, the other products were mostly fine too, but I dislike those that are white/paste-like because they tend to leave more of a visible mess; especially with squirmy little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Random Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff on the market for literally generations!
customer_reviews.text: Used for daughters and my son; they used it for their daughters/sons. Recently, my son's son - it just WORKS! It's thickness is great protection and the medication is a great healer for the poor kid with a raw leg area that wasn't privvy to A&D. (The parents usually then switch). 'Easy to clean' - eh, not at all horrible, but it was designed to resist warm urine for hours (think about it). It always washed out of our cloth diapers without extra handling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Egan

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: It's getting warm and my little boy is starting to get some rash down there. My mother in law recommended this to me and so I bought it, not expecting much. Boy, the rash literally was gone after a day. The redness subsided. I now like leaving it on overnight for when he sleeps so that the urine doesn't touch his bum and genital directly. The scent is not too strong. I don't mind it. It's moisturising but not pasty like some other diaper rash products. Highly recommend it if you're looking for a diaper rash solution and don't like diaper creams.
customer_reviews.author: Auri

customer_reviews.title: OPENED containers- NO protective seal
customer_reviews.text: So this has NOTHING to do with A&D itself- but with Amazon- the tube itself comes OPENED and WITHOUT A PROTECTIVE SEAL- this is unacceptable considering most of us are using this for babies!!! Esp now with Cov-19- Amazon really needs to check their quality control with this one- I wanted to write this to warn others BEWARE- if u buy it may come WITHOUT a protective seal- DO NOT USE!!!!!!! Call amazon for replacement
customer_reviews.author: Pink Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Large Container
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product months ago and are still on the same tub. My baby has developed several rashes while at school and using this over the weekend clears it right up. She doesn't complain when we apply this as she knows A&D is soothing. The scent is also great and not too potent. Very happy with the capability of this product. It also does a great job providing a barrier around her sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Kayaker's swamp butt fix!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't smell the greatest, but it did what I was hoping it would. I have been searching for a preventative/cure for kayak swamp butt. Read an article that recommended A&D as a pre-trip preventative. It's thick, greasy, and smells weird, but it works! Highly recommend for kayakers who are tired of the itching/irritation that usually follows long, wet floats. Put it on thick and go float!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the fact that its highly doctor recommended, Amazon might be the best place to get this product because of the size and price. I use this probably every diaper change and its probably the only thing I will use for a diaper rash. If my son has a Diaper rash after applying its highly effective and will mainly clear up by his next diaper change which is probably in an hour or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Deniz

customer_reviews.title: It's the smelly kind but works
customer_reviews.text: A&d ointment has always been a great go to however I forgot how bad it smells. After application to the baby and washing my hands I still have A&d ointment smell on my hands for the rest of the day that's it. Which leads me to use other products. However I found a neat little trick just use a white b to stick in the tub and you still awake before application it helps with the smell somewhat
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Kee

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed container
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with no seal on the container. These days, everything you get for health is sealed at the factory so it can't be tampered with. This has no seal, on the mouth of the container, on the lid, anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: A Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased smaller tubes of A&D Ointment for years. Because it was a better deal, I purchased the large, 1lb. jar this time. Initially, I was surprised to find no inner protective seal. Then, I got a whiff of the contents. It smelled almost rancid or extremely petroleum-like.....certainly not a pleasant aroma to use with a baby or any human for that matter. I did not read the reviews before purchasing but now I see that this is a common complaint. What has happened to this product? I still have a little left in a small tube and the odor of the jar contents is distinctly different.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Krause

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you have a baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you have a baby at home. It works great to treat diaper rash and to protect their skin. We like this one better than Densitin. It also smell nice and keep our baby’s skin healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel Aquino

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t know this product, where have you ...
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t know this product, where have you been. Or maybe you were too young to remember when your MOM put on your reddened, irritated butt. It still works on adult and OLD butts!! Just don’t overdo it. DON’T GO FOR IMITATION PRODUCTS, THEY ARE NOT THE SAME.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Great product (also for sensitive skins)
customer_reviews.text: This is a five star product but I'm reducing one star coz i don't really love the smell. It has been a great product for babies who are still in their nappies. It helps with the rash around the groin area. Apply it after every nappy change for better results. If you do find this review helpful, please mark it and help the review community. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: CYBERTRON

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DIAPER CREAM!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - works GREAT on keeping diaper rash away. It is also great for when you have cracked thumbs or fingers - this stuff works amazing! I put it on at night and by morning no more cracked fingers! You also can’t beat the price! Best price around! Also works great for when you first get tattoos to keep the itching away.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, but with strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I really like the consistency of these when used as a diaper cream, but I don't love the smell. I can smell it through my baby's clothes and it's kind of overpowering. Desitin has no smell in comparison. However, it's very easy to spread and definitely helped clear up a minor rash before it got out of hand, so I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I've been using A&D Ointment for 46 years and it hasn't failed me yet. Not only does it work for babies, it is great on African Amercans hair. It does great breakage control, damage control, and thickening. Try it, believe me, it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian F Pinckney

customer_reviews.title: Bulk size of Healing Goodness
customer_reviews.text: This is my healing balm of choice and I love this large version (used to get it in 1 oz tubes) It soothes and heals wonderfully. I love the smell of it as well. I have used it for burns, rashes, chafing, rough skin and chapped lips with great success. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mainestly

customer_reviews.title: No seal??
customer_reviews.text: This arrived without any seal. Considering this pandemic, and also the fact that this is for babies- it shouldn’t come without a seal.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Don't care for smell, but works well.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend swears by this stuff who lives in Thailand. In fact, I have to bring a jar of it once a year when I visit or I never hear the end of it! The don't sell it over there.To me, it has a bit of a nasty smell. I can see where this will far outlast a standard moisturizing lotion, as it's far thicker and a little bit goes a long way. I'm sure there's no question it works well on dry skin. The smell does seem to linger for a really long time though, so not my cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Troy D.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good, very good
customer_reviews.text: Being using it since my baby was born, never had a rash, easy to spread, cause no redness, my nephew skin is very sensitive and still this still works, actually he had eczema on his left leg and we put a little A and D on it every day, it healed it,when u wipes it ,it comes off ... being buying it again and again...
customer_reviews.author: Widlyne Damis

customer_reviews.title: Smells baa-baa-bad!
customer_reviews.text: We love A&D and I usually get the small tubes at the store. We go through it so fast, I bought the tub. I get that it has lanolin but no other lanolin product we have used smells like the source! My baby's bedroom and behind smell like a manger now, it is INTENSE. She doesn't seem to care but I cannot get used to the sheepy scent.
customer_reviews.author: DMHodor

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff - use it on my hands/feet.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sealant for hands and feet. Magically fixes redness and cracking when you put it on and put on cotton socks or gloves overnight. Total staple in my routine! Godsend if you watch your hands a lot. The only con is the smell is very strong, imo, so I do this right before bed and not when I'm going out.
customer_reviews.author: goaprilgo

customer_reviews.title: Melted and I think used?
customer_reviews.text: I live in Phoenix so I understand the heat but my ointment came completely melted into a liquid where when I opened it, it leaked EVERYWHERE and was very difficult to remove and clean up. You would think that a product like this has a safety seal on the inside of the cap but it did not — unless I got a used product!???
customer_reviews.author: Madison C

customer_reviews.title: I love A+D ointment and will use no other
customer_reviews.text: I love A+D ointment and will use no other. I have 2 children and both of my kids never experienced diaper rash. I apply a thin layer after each diaper change which may seem excessive but its not a difficult task to keep my kids comfortable. I ordered these large tubs because you cannot find them anywhere in the stores these days. They delivered with no complications and in 2 days with my prime membership. This is also great to rub on your kids cheeks and chest when they start teething to help with skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA DIXON

customer_reviews.title: NO Seal
customer_reviews.text: There’s NO seal on the container. Not normally a paranoid parent, but why isn’t there a seal on these jars? There’s no plastic cover on the outside or foil on the inside to prevent someone from tampering with the baby product. Bought one jar and thought it was defective so got a replacement. Nope they obviously all don’t come with one. Not putting on my kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love A&D. It protects babies butts so well, and helps heal rashes quickly. $10 for 16oz of this is amazing. The off brand at target(up&up) is only 4oz for almost $3. And the name brand(this stuff) is even more expensive. This is probably the best deal for A&D I've ever seen. And such a great amount!😀 A&D does smell strong, but that's fine
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: Must have for newborns
customer_reviews.text: Been using this ointment since I bought it and my newborn has not once had a diaper rash. I also used it for protection in private area after circumcision to prevent infections. I also been placing it in areas in the body to prevent hot rashes. It is so useful and a must have for babies. One of MUST HAVE items when having a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Surlatina

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: Like the large jar easier to get in the container, apply to ointment to the area that needs this product. Large opening of the container makes it so much easier to use the product. The product works well and stays on the skin while moisturizing the skin. Having sensitive skin I use this frequently. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: boojoe2

customer_reviews.title: Open package
customer_reviews.text: Package opened and no seal so will not be using on my children
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing, but smells gross.
customer_reviews.text: I hate the smell, HATE IT. Smells like gasoline to me. So, I switched to something else. My 13 month old got her 1st diaper rash ever. Purchased more a&d, and diaper rash was gone in just 2 applications. I'm sad I have to stick with the A&D because I despise the smell, but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pickett

customer_reviews.title: BEST diaper cream!
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper cream for the really bad days!! Anytime my kid is teething he gets the worst diaper rash and this is the only one that does not bother him when I put it on and helps clear up the sore bum the fastest. Funny smell but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AKmandy

customer_reviews.title: Does not include Vit A &D.  Misleading
customer_reviews.text: By the name, I thought it had vitamin A and D. It does not include. It’s just the name of the product. Amazon would not return, even though when I searched, I entered VITAMIN A & D ointment and this showed. Amazon improve your search engine
customer_reviews.author: alhal22

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, creates a great barrier to prevent rashes and help then heal. Our kiddo has really sensitive skin and rashes easily, this has been a life saver, the zinc creams just don't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Just wow!  The best stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Out family’s go to for sensitive areas! It protects and heals ! The baby and and all of the adults are never without this ointment! From the bum to a dry nose... it fits all of our needs! Dry hands from frequent washing? Just put it on before you go to bed! Dry nose from a cold? It’s got that too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Use it every diaper change
customer_reviews.text: Love this ointment. Been using it since my first baby during every diaper change. My babies all have sensitive skin and this protects their little bottoms. We put it in eczema patches and other skin irritations too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I got this initially to use for aftercare following a large amount of tattooing. I've ended up using it on various bumps and bruises, and mixing it into my regular lotion in the winter when my skin is really dry. Highly recommend doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for elderly with incontinence.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my bedridden patient. Not only is this stuff incredible for heat rashes, it keeps the skin protected from moisture for those with incontinence. Elderly get diaper rashes too, and this ointment is the best I have ever used on her bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something to use at every diaper change to avoid diaper rash then this is it. I see many people on here say it didn't help get rid of diaper rash, this one isn't that one. This one is to PREVENT. try the other one the one with zinc its usually a white and blue tube.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use on our newborn since it had such great reviews. I wish I had checked whether the reviews said anything about smell before buying it, though, because it smells badly and a lot. The smell doesn’t dissipate either - so after we apply it to baby’s butt, baby continues to smell like the ointment until cleaned. So rather than having a stinky baby, we now have a useless tub of this stuff and we are using Vaseline - which is what they used at the hospital anyway.
customer_reviews.author: shmatkotija

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep those rough spots soft
customer_reviews.text: I have no babies in my house.. I use this on my grown up skin..I use it on my elbows and knees when I get out the shower.. I also used it on my feet especially after a pedicure... everything feels so soft the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Makes your poop hole feel comfortable if having a colonoscopy!
customer_reviews.text: This really helps you if you are cleaning out your intestines for a colonoscopy! Unlike the tubes, it's much easier to simply grab a wad of toilet paper, dig in and smear this in your poop hole! It will save you from a very sore a$$!
customer_reviews.author: Schnitzel

customer_reviews.title: A great source for mysterious skin irritations
customer_reviews.text: Have found it to be an excellent product for a variety of skin damages, besides diaper rash. While in a Rehab Facility, I had some kind of an irritation on my nose, and one of the nurses there introduced me to the product which cleared up the rash in a day or two. This really began the search for the product for our family, and we are happy to find such a great source.
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby's bottom!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different diaper creams on my son and they've all been eh okay. My son doesn't get diaper rash very often but when he does it is BAD! This A&D clears it up so amazingly fast! When this tub runs out I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is nice and does what it’s supposed to. I was sent one jar and realized that it did not have a seal so they sent me another. I opened it to find that it didn’t come with a seal either. Not sure what that’s about? If you want a sealed product I would not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best for preventing diaper rash. I used it for every diaper change and we only had one diaper rash until my daughter was out of diapers. I wouldn't use the same jar for it, but this stuff is also great for chapped nose and lips during winter time. I do suggest keeping the diaper jar and face jar separate.
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super mosturizing, easy to apply and absorbs well. Gammy’s tushy is looking good with this, though we combine it with penaten cream as well when needed, depending on whether the skin is very red (Penaten is better then) or dry, in which case we use A+D Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Use to help dry skin. Good to moisturize lips at night. Great price
customer_reviews.author: L E Wesson

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it it's actually More better than buying in the tubes atleast u can use all of it an not have to squeeze a tube I totally will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: missjeezy716

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this against my better judgement from my son’s wife’s list for their first child. It’s a good product but this is way overpriced. I know because I use A&D ointment on my arms/hands per my spine specialist due to tears and bruising.
customer_reviews.author: Joan of Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this ever since I brought my daughter home from the hospital. She is 1 years old today! She has never had a diaper rash before so I will continue to use it! I also prefer this one over the squeeze type because I feel like this come out and applies more smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and it works super fast, have a chafe put this on and you are feeling brand spanking new. TMI but for women who may be dry below, use it daily and you will feel a huge difference. I workout a lot and I use this product almost daily
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: While I’m not a fan of the scent, this stuff is the best hands down. It does what it needs to! Very moisturizing and it relieves sores very well! As a person with a physical disability, I make sure I always buy a jar. I definitely recommend having at least a jar on hand. It lasts a very long time too!
customer_reviews.author: Young Lady

customer_reviews.title: My NB has extremely sensitive skin which results in some pretty nasty rashes
customer_reviews.text: This cream works wonders! My NB has extremely sensitive skin which results in some pretty nasty rashes. Tried several different rash creams (even the ones given to us in the NICU) before trying this one and I regret not starting here. Works quickly! Will definitely continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Carzoli

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a LONG time!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product I was initially put off by the scent but got over it. Its great for diaper changes and on parts of skin thats becoming irritated. Its a bit stronger from regular A & D ointment because it has other ingredients. The best feature is that it lasts a LONG time!
customer_reviews.author: sasha khotimsky

customer_reviews.title: Best in class ointment
customer_reviews.text: When we first brought our little one home, we were using Destin. At the recommendation of our pediatrician we switched to A&D. I’m sure everyone has their own preference but this item has been our go to ever since she was two months. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sahkira

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper ointment EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love this one over all the different diaper creams! After switching to this brand, my LO never got a diaper rash. My DS poops ALOT, and I needed something that was easy to use and works!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love it good stuff !
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff prevents diaper rash and helped my grandson recover from his circumcision. My Dr. Recommended this for my children years ago and it worked for them. Love that I can buy it through Amazon and have it shipped free to my daughter for my grand .
customer_reviews.author: lke

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for baby’s bottom
customer_reviews.text: I used 7 yrs ago with my son & now I use it with my two 4 month olds. I apply every other diaper change. This stuff is great and doesn’t leave any residue like Desitin. I Highly recommend that all parents use it
customer_reviews.author: Yannie1231

customer_reviews.title: It is a great moisturizer but it is an ointment
customer_reviews.text: I have taken many things for my psoriasis but I never thought this would help my skin. My psoriasis is on my leg and is quiet large and unsightly. I put this ointment on my leg and bottom of my foot and then wrap it in plastic, such as saran wrap then sleep. In morning all the scales are loose enough to be wiped away. Great for baby rash too.
customer_reviews.author: Ebbie

customer_reviews.title: Best Butt(er) Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Forget desitin!! This is so much better. It clears up any diaper rash in minutes!! Just wished it wasn’t in a tub and in a tube. Super easy to spread...like butter!
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Great preventative
customer_reviews.text: This size tub is perfect for keeping on the changing table. You'll use it every time and baby couldn't be happier. Not very messy. Easy to apply and last so much longer then the tube
customer_reviews.author: Baked Beanz

customer_reviews.title: NO SEAL
customer_reviews.text: Was not sealed??? No seal on the product when I opened the tub. Not sure if I should return it or not. Does anyone know if this is standard?? Seems off to me
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Works for nearly anything
customer_reviews.text: This ointment is amazing! It can be used on dry skin, cuts, and even chapped lips. It provides instant relief. The tub itself lasts a very long time. No need to over apply, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: SM_M

customer_reviews.title: For Much More than Babies' Rear-Ends
customer_reviews.text: I bought a tub of A+D 12 years ago at Costco and love it for everything from moisturizing nasal crusts to preventing sores or ulcers in sensitive places, or healing sensitive chafed areas that also need cleansing. At the Amazon price of $10/lb it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS OT HELPS WITH MY ISSUES OF BEING IN DEPENDS BRIEFS THIS HELPS WITH DIAPER RASH & OTHER ISSUES.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: NUMBER 1 PREVENTION OINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! With my 2nd born I used this as a prevention with EVERY diaper change. He never ever got a diaper rash using this. Now with my 3rd born I use it EVERY diaper change with him and no diaper rash at all. I live for this stuff. I also use this on my babies skin as a moisturizer instead of lotion and it keeps skin clear and so soft. It clears away redness from skin irritation as well. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sagacious Imah

customer_reviews.title: Work very well but has strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Work well on keeping my son from diaper rash. Generous amount for the money. Minus one star for the strong scent especially when it’s made mainly for baby use.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Ointment
customer_reviews.text: We have been using A+D and Aquaphor for our daughter and I can see the difference. The texture of A+D is very soft, I think it is due to Lanolin. It works miracle on babies. This is replacing vaseline and aquaphor in my household. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: No more diaper rash!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have tried literally every rash cream out there and none of them work as great as this. We ONLY use A+D, it doesn't cause my son any rashes Mf is easy to apply and this container has lasted us a good while, love it and will stock up on this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lusveya

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a bit strong & not baby sweet, but it does an amazing job. My bb has NEVER had a diaper rash, I liberally apply morning & night.
customer_reviews.author: The Hirtes

customer_reviews.title: Bayer A+D ointment very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. The vitamin A and D come from cod liver oil, that is are natural, and the balance of ingredients is just right. Other ointments have A and D but are chemically produced and the formulation is not as good as this product. I am very happy with this brand, Bayer, and will continue to use it. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: nona50

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for diaper rash.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for my baby's sensitive skin. I use it as a preventative and treatment of diaper rash. My little peanut was born premature and has eczema in patches on his body. So when he gets occasional diaper rash or a little case of the runs where he needs multiple diaper changes in a very short period of time, he gets irritated from the frequent wiping. A+D has been the best product for his tender bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Low cost for excellent diaper rash ointment
customer_reviews.text: This diaper rash ointment is very effective at clearing up my baby's bottom when it is raw from the mixture of poo/pee. It is very good at preventing the diaper rash as well. The cost of the ointment is quite reasonable. The only issuse is it is a bit smelly. Other than that I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CNDW

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong not as good as dr Bordeaux red paste
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok strong smell more like Vaseline with fragrance but not like dr bronners zinc cream in red box that’s best for us so far this I barely use got 2 cases but not as impressed as with other kinds
customer_reviews.author: PolishPrincess88

customer_reviews.title: A&D ointment for the win for its versatility!
customer_reviews.text: I love A&D ointment. Relied on this as a teen for my tattoos recovery and I rely on it now for my son’s diaper change regimen. Love the smell, but maybe that’s just me. I’m so so so glad they offer this in a tub. Wish they’d come bigger!!
customer_reviews.author: Banana nana

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this for any rash!
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many different diaper rash kinds throughout my three children and this one beats the rest! It works right away and clears up any rash your child has! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amber N

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: When I was recovering in a care center they used barrier cream in between each change. This product costs less, works far better and comes in a large container.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Decent but quality has diminished
customer_reviews.text: Just not the same quality product it used to be. Decent value, but no where near as effective as the stuff from a pretty old tube still on hand. Decent value for the money overall compared to buying locally.
customer_reviews.author: techjunkie109

customer_reviews.title: Great cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is great. Goes on smoothly and is unscented. Protects and heals redness brilliantly. Also really like the texture as it is not greasy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Scent good
customer_reviews.text: Don't use for baby's face, My baby sitter used it on the baby's face and it resulted in a severe allergy. Is used for the body, buttocks are very good, very easy to spread out, very moist, taste general.
customer_reviews.author: Fannie li

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: The truth is that this is great product but to me the scent is not the same as the one in the tube. It works like magic on my baby.
customer_reviews.author: MariA

customer_reviews.title: Great healing ointment
customer_reviews.text: This ointment is wonderful. Has been around for many years! Used for diaper rash, dry skin, small wounds, with fast healing results. Large mouth tub is nice. I use tongue depressors or qtips to get ointment out of jar. Arrived fast, perfect! Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: SNRNAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for overnight
customer_reviews.text: Use this every night on our little one. When she has a rash, we use a different medicated ointment but this is great for every night protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I didn’t use it earlier. It has been a blessing for my daughter. She gets rashes often but this cream makes it better faster. . It also does wonders for her eczema!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like this in a jar the best. I have used A & D all my life. It is great for burns and for rashes on bottoms big or small.
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Do it. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my babies dry. Soil doesn't impact their skin at all. My babies are almost two months and I use this on their skin too. Wherever I see the skin may be irritated
customer_reviews.author: letisha

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT, NURSE RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I've found which actually helps relieve severely dry skin. It was recommended to me by a nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for diaper rashes and better for me to use this rather than misplacing the diaper rash tubes I would buy.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Desitin!
customer_reviews.text: Get this instead of Desitin! My baby kept getting horrible diaper rashes while using Desitin, we switched to this and it has worked wonders! No rashes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toodles Darling

product_meta.title: A+D Original Diaper Rash Ointment, Baby Diaper Rash Cream and Skin Protectant With Lanolin, 16 Ounce (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: If you have an infant or toddler, you probably know what diaper rash looks like. Red, bumpy, chafed skin is no fun for babies or their parents A+D Original Ointment for diaper rash is a smart addition to your collection of baby skincare products. Safe to use at every diaper change, it's easy to apply and gentle on tender bottoms. A+D ointment helps prevent diaper rash by forming a protective barrier to help seal out wetness. It is also useful on your own skin and lips to provide soothing relief to chapped and chafed skin. Indications: Stop Use Indications: This product is for external use only. When using this product do not get it in your eyes. Stop use and ask a doctor if the condition worsens, symptoms last more than 7 days, or symptoms clear up and occur again within a few days. Do not use A+D on deep or puncture wounds, animal bites, or serious burns. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Health Concern: A+D helps treat and prevent diaper rash. It helps temporarily protect minor cuts, scrapes, and burns. A+D temporarily protects and helps relieve chapped or cracked skin and lips. A+D protects chafed skin due to diaper rash and helps seal out wetness. Covered by the Bayer HealthCare – Consumer Health 60-Day Satisfaction Guarantee.
feature_bullets: Pediatrician recommended: A plus D original ointment is a top choice among baby diaper rash products recommended by pediatricians
Treats and prevents diaper rash: Lanolin and petrolatum combine to help seal out wetness and prevent diaper rash for your precious baby
Protects baby's delicate skin: A+D original ointment temporarily protects the skin of your infant or toddler from wetness and helps to relieve the discomfort of chapped, chafed, and cracked skin
Easy to apply: You don't need an applicator or spatula to apply A+D original ointment. This gentle formula is smooth and spreads evenly
Relieves your chapped skin and lips: Not just for babies with diaper rash, A+D original ointment with lanolin can also be used to protect your chafed skin and lips, too
